overview: A city exhausted by the Corona disaster. Detective Sayama Rentaro is asked by Isogawa, the political mastermind, to follow the mysterious woman Akiko. Sayama begins to follow Akiko, but soon the two fall in love and are pursued by Isogawa's subordinate, Tateishi. Cornered, Sayama and Akiko head for the airport to escape overseas...
title: Rain in a Dream
